TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LocalizationCategory extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the category value of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute"> for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] class or class member.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute> attribute can be applied to a class, property, or method.
For more information on how to use localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](../Topic/Localization%20Attributes%20and%20Comments.md).
## Examples The following code example shows the category value of a <xref:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute> defined for a button.
[!code-xml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet1](../../add/codesnippet/Xaml/AttributesSnippets/Attributes.xaml#attributessnippet1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory Button = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory CheckBox = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory ComboBox = int32(6)

Docs.summary: A T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True or related control such as T:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory Font = int32(14)

Docs.summary: Font-related data such as font name, style, or size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory Hyperlink = int32(11)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory Ignore = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Do not localize this resource. This does not apply to any child nodes that might exist.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory Inherit = int32(15)

Docs.summary: Inherits its category from a parent node.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory Label = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory ListBox = int32(7)

Docs.summary: A T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True or related control such as T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory Menu = int32(8)

Docs.summary: A T:System.Windows.Controls.Menu?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True or related control such as T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory NeverLocalize = int32(17)

Docs.summary: Do not localize this resource, or any child nodes whose category is set to **Inherit**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Resource does not belong to a standard category.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory RadioButton = int32(9)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory Text = int32(1)

Docs.summary: For a lengthy piece of text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory TextFlow = int32(12)

Docs.summary: For panels that can contain text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory Title = int32(2)

Docs.summary: For a single line of text, such as text used for a title.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory ToolTip = int32(10)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.LocalizationCategory XmlData = int32(13)
